title: Prism-Backed Asset Arm Acquires 8 Hotels in Upmarket Push
full_text: Prism-Backed Asset Arm Acquires 8 Hotels in Upmarket Push. Sunday PropTech expansion shows Prism’s effort to shed its budget-hotel image ahead of an IPO and present a more predictable business to investors.. Sunday PropTech, also known as Oyo Assets and backed by Prism, the parent company of Oyo, has acquired eight premium hotels, according to people familiar with the transaction. The combined value of t… [+760 chars]
